siteMetadata.defaultTitle: Raymon Shi - Hey there, Ray here
siteMetadata.defaultDescription: Raymon Shi is a passionate software developer who loves building things that make a difference. Currently, he works on the MyChart Scheduling team at Epic Systems, where he focuses on digital front door solutions that help patients connect more easily with healthcare. His work includes key features like Provider Finder, Location Finder, Open Scheduling, and On My Wayâ€”tools designed to streamline and enhance the patient experience.
